Something was terribly wrong.  Straight Shot looks to Waspinator with a fri=
ghtened expression.  Just like him she did NOT like the sight of Dark Rodim=
us.  But instead of running she prepares to defend both herself and Waspina=
tor, and arms her forearm arrow launcher.

" Okay get ready ta fly in the o=
pposite direction.  If he goes inta alt mode, which I hope he does, I can p=
op his tires.  That'll slow him down.  Don't worry, I won't let him hurt yo=
u."

Meanwhile, Tucson catches Noctorro but he senses something wrong.  The=
 other Fuzors, they did not follow and he growls, knowing that he could hav=
e to deploy another sonar roar.  

" I copy you Leo Prime...  Definitely an=
 evil force is at play and I'm determined to find out the cause.  Whatever =
it is, has effected the Fuzors..  I have a feeling it could return for Rodi=
mus.  I'm going to meet Noctorro now."

The silver dragon leaps up into the=
 air to meet Noctorro.  He hovers in a defensive mode.

"WHERE ARE THE OTHE=
RS!? ANSWER ME!"

Tucson booms with a roar mixed in.

Perpetually on the mo=
ve and constantly busy.
